body:
Before this PR, press tab after `spack unit-test` throughs an error:
```bash
$ spack unit-test <tab>
usage: spack test [-h] SUBCOMMAND ...
spack test: error: the following arguments are required: SUBCOMMAND
usage: spack test [-h] SUBCOMMAND ...
spack test: error: the following arguments are required: SUBCOMMAND
```

This PR 
- fixes the issue by correcting list generation command.
- rename complete function `_tests` to `_unit_tests` for consistency.
title: Fix tab completion erroring with `spack unit-test`
